creator: paul.costin@ubs.com
text:
create the following .bat file

ant clean
ant compile


Problem is :  The 1st ant completes ok and the script exits.

That´s usual bevaviour of batch programming.

You have to write
   call ant clean
   call ant compile


BTW you can
   call ant clean compile
as well in this case ...
creator: jan@materne.de
